attributes.action: Following yesterday’s Court ruling that Horses and Donkeys will be returned to the owner of Spindles Farm, Amersham, where they had been removed due to maltreatment, we urge the Government to please intervene to ensure these poors animals are not returned to such a place of suffering.  They deserve to live out the remainders of their lives with dignity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
